hotels.title: Unmissable Outback Luxury Glamping Retreat near Kings Canyon
hotels.description: Experience the majesty of Northern Territory's rugged outback with an opulent glamping stay at Kings Creek Station, nestled at the foot of stunning Watarrka (Kings Canyon). Traverse the Mars-like landscape of the hugely significant Watarrka National Park, take a day trip to awe-inspiring Uluru or relax in the comforts of your unique accommodation, which combines the iconic Australian camping experience with luxurious creature comforts. Soak up the breathtaking beauty of the awe-inspiring terrain as you enjoy the incredible onsite facilities of this cattle station, including a refreshing swimming pool with unparalleled views.
